sentences.en: A hackney - coach was called , and the father and daughter departed in it.
sentences.cn: 他们雇了一部出租马车,父女俩便坐着车走了.

sentences.en: Before the advent of the motorcar, an ancestor bred the best hackney carriage horses.
sentences.cn: 在现代汽车出现之前, 祖先们养殖最好的哈克尼乘用马.

sentences.en: Detachable ( and multi - positional ) hanging rails reference the sea of goal posts at near - by Hackney Marshes.
sentences.cn: 可拆卸 ( 和多位置 ) 吊轨参考海洋法目标员额附近的哈克尼沼泽.

sentences.en: He did trace them easily to Clapham, but no farther; for on entering that place they removed into a hackney-coach and dismissed the chaise that brought them from Epsom.
sentences.cn: 他一路追踪觅迹，追到克拉普汗，这倒还不费什么事，可是再往前追便不容易，因为他们两人到达此地后，便把从艾普桑雇来的马车打发走了，重新雇了出租马车。

sentences.en: I live in Hackney a London borough where crime is high and the schools are poor.
sentences.cn: 我住在伦敦的哈克尼区(Hackney),这里犯罪率较高,学校教育质量也比较差.

sentences.en: Oh! but their removing from the chaise into an hackney coach is such a presumption! And, besides, no traces of them were to be found on the Barnet road.
sentences.cn: 哎哟！可是他们把原来的马车打发走，换上了出租的马车，光是凭这一点就可想而知！此外，到巴纳特去的路上，也找不到他们的踪迹。

sentences.en: They make a trip with a hackney.
sentences.cn: 他们乘出租马车去旅行.

sentences.en: What is true in Kampala may not be true in Hackney – or Jerusalem.
sentences.cn: 在坎帕拉成立的理论,不一定在伦敦(或者耶路撒冷)也成立.

words.tran_cn: 出租（马匹、马车等）；役使（hackney的过去式）
乘用马；出租马车；出租汽车；操贱役的人

trans.tran_cn: 乘用马，出租马车，操贱役的人
